We also pushed out a few fixes resulting in improved app performance. To take advantage of this release update the Hulu app today!

In this release we are helping spread the Hulu love by introducing SharePlay. With SharePlay you can watch content from the Hulu streaming library in sync with friends and family over FaceTime. We also launched a feature allowing Live TV users to easily flip between channels during playback. Upgrade to the newest version of the app on your iPhone or iPad to try it out.

We re bidding farewell to a few things with this update. For starters say adios to some pesky bugs that were causing trouble. Along with the routine pest control we made a few improvements and polishing work. New: Say bye bye to waiting. The Hulu app now opens quicker than ever and gets you straight to your Home lineup in record time. Fixed: Some viewers may have encountered issues when trying to use Chromecast with their iOS devices. No more of that! That issue was fixed with this latest update.

We re also launching a new and improved version of our Details page Improved: The Details page now features a sleeker layout that makes it easier for you to learn information about the series navigate to an episode select an action item i.e. play resume record etc. and surf through the different tabs within the page.
We squashed more pesky bugs took care of some polishing work and ironed out some kinks. Get this latest version of our app and continue enjoying your Hulu favorites.
Here s a story for you. We had bugs. We scared them. Now they re gone. The End.

Roses are red Violets are blue. Bugs drop dead When Hulu says shoo! Love trumps all right Well that s a bummer because we ve got none of that for bugs. Recite this poem three times and bugs will flee. Valentine s Day may be around the corner but love has its limits as they say.

Dum dum dum! It s doomsday for bugs. Hulu is sending those pesky critters a one way ticket to Fyre Festival cheese sandwiches not included. We bet that experience will keep them away for a while so sit back relax and enjoy your Hulu favorites!

It s a new year and we ve got some resolutions to share with you. Well one actually make the Hulu experience even better! So far so good. Bugs are getting squashed left and right so you don t have to worry about critters crawling up your leg while streaming your Hulu favorites. We ve also got an exciting new feature to share with y all... New: You can now use the built in remote on your headphones to control video playback on your iOS device. We ve also added RW FF controls to the AirPlay lock screen.

These Holidays we plan on gifting bugs our secret weapon: some of that gross fruit scattered brown bread that has become a Christmas punchline. Yes you guessed right we ll be feeding them some fruitcake. GASP Once they taste its unpalatable dough they ll be out of here! Fix: ...and that fruitcake worked! We fed it to some naughty bugs that were making it hard for you to RW FF and search the app while you were casting. We shoved fruitcake down their throats and now they ve fluttered away into the winter wonderland.

We re making a list. We re checking it twice. We re going to find out who s been naughty and nice and some bugs have definitely been naughty. Roasted on an open fire they go! Make sure to update to this new version of our app to get the latest bug fixes and a cool new feature. New: The Hulu experience on iOS is going pro! When streaming on the iPad Pro your Hulu favorites will now be on full display.

Can you believe Thanksgiving is right around the corner In spirit of this week s festivities we re giving thanks for the following new feature improvements and fixes: AirPlay Feast your eyes on the big screen! New AirPlay functionality lets you stream all of your Hulu favorites from your iOS device to your Apple TV. Improved Image Quality While browsing the Hulu app you ll notice that the images for your Hulu favorites are crisper and clearer than before. Bug fixes Those critters keep crawling back up but we keep flushing them back down. We ve got these bugs beat.

No shave November is upon us and you bet we ll be honoring this shaggy tradition here at Hulu. Now that we don t have to spend time cutting hair or trimming beards we re devoting extra time and attention to enhancing the app. Improvements: We enabled lock screen controls for Chromecast. Gone are the days when you had to unlock your phone to pause the show or rewind to a favorite part. Simply pick up your phone and the controls are there. We also updated the screen orientation flow for iPads to make it easier when you re switching from landscape to portrait mode and vice versa. No need to crane your neck anymore to watch TV. Fix: Halloween may be old news but some bugs don t squash easy. No treat for the bugs meant lots of tricks on Hulu but fear not. We put on our hats whipped out our wands and the creepy crawlers are now gone. RIP bugs.

New: You can now edit and delete profiles in app! Of course you still have the option to do so on hulu.com but we wanted to save you some time and help you do so with a couple of swipes and taps. Improvements: By now we have practically become entomologists. We know bugs rituals and cycles we know where they gather to eat drink and talk about the latest thing they crashed we know their cliques and we know what they had for lunch. Oh yeah that s how good we ve become. Bugs we are going to get you!
Improvement: Some bugs have been squashed.
Fix: We heard some of you with live TV couldn t watch your favorite local channels. But thanks to some speedy work from our team you can resume accurately! chatting about the weather.
Improvement: We ve accepted that those bugs won t swat themselves. So we took some time to clean things up and make a few aesthetic improvements to ensure you enjoy our app even more.
Fix: We worked on tiny and not so tiny fixes that are hard to describe. Just trust us when we say that these changes will make a difference in the long run.
Fix: We ve told you before that we are always in the hunt for bugs. While searching for the big one we stumbled upon other creepy crawlies that were causing trouble. They are goners too.

Fix: You know which bugs suck the most Crashing bugs. We thought we got rid of ALL the bugs last time or at least MOST but there was a little pesky one that was causing lots of trouble when some of you tried launching our app. We quickly put on our bug squashing gear tracked it down and made it eat dirt which it thought was just fine bugs love dirt .

Let s face it. Some bugs are pretty sweet. Butterflies for example. Or beetles. Heck fireflies are amazing. But somehow the ones that end up in our app are always annoying little critters. They don t have colorful wings their butts don t lit up and they aren t even edible! So we end up in the sad situation of having to kill them. We think we did a good job this release so you should be able to move around without any bug disruption. Until they find their way back in and we need to repeat the cycle.

Let s face it. Some bugs are pretty sweet. Butterflies for example. Or beetles. Heck fireflies are amazing. But somehow the ones that end up in our app are always annoying little critters. They don t have colorful wings their butts don t lit up and they aren t even edible! So we end up in the sad situation of having to kill them. We think we did a good job this release so you should be able to move around without any bug disruption. Until they find their way back in and we need to repeat the cycle.

New: We are coming up with new ways for you to personalize what shows up on your Live Guide. Before you could only filter channels by Recent or All but now you have more options. See a selection of channels that are relevant to you like Sports or News. Learn what s coming up soon on your own terms. New: Autoplay is now enabled with video clips. You asked for it. We aren t sure about the use case but go ahead and watch clips all day! Improvement: We made some changes to the Guide for on demand content. You get badges content in batches and hopefully less crashes. Fix: We worked on tiny and not so tiny fixes that are hard to describe. Just trust us when we say that these changes will make a difference in the long run.

Fix: We released so many new features the last couple of months that for this update we had to take a break and stick to regular upkeeping. We did a deep clean and got rid of some bugs here and there.

Fix: There was a big nasty bug eating part of our code which caused our app to crash randomly. It was driving us and YOU nuts! It took us some time to find it but we finally figured out how to track it down and wipe it out. Fix: We ve told you before that we are always in the hunt for bugs. While searching for the big one we stumbled upon other creepy crawlies that were causing trouble. They are goners too.

It sure feels like summer: look at all those bugs! Eeek! Fortunately we got our PhDs in Bug killing so we rolled up our sleeves and got to work. Fix: We had some issues with closed captions while casting. For starters caption settings were greyed out however you could still toggle between On and Off. Confusing right If somehow you figured out that you could still select On and you were expecting it to work bad news: closed captions would not appear on the videos you were casting. Sorry about that. We killed that bug as soon as we spotted it so everything should work smoothly now. Fix: Oh right. There was another casting bug. If you clicked the Cast icon mid playback the video would start playing from the beginning. It should definitely start from the position you were. We went ahead and got rid of that one too.

Fix: We had some issues with closed captions while casting. For starters caption settings were greyed out however you could still toggle between On and Off. Confusing right If somehow you figured out that you could still select On and you were expecting it to work bad news: closed captions would not appear on the videos you were casting. Sorry about that. We killed that bug as soon as we spotted it so everything should work smoothly now. Fix: Oh right. There was another casting bug. If you clicked the Cast icon mid playback the video would start playing from the beginning. It should definitely start from the position you were. We went ahead and got rid of that one too.

Improvement: You binge watched all your recorded shows Boot them away with fewer taps! Before you had to select and choose to delete EACH video on your Cloud DVR. Now you can multi select and delete in bulk all those episodes and movies that are just taking up your valuable storage space. Fix: We do this on each release so no surprises here: we crushed some annoying bugs! TBH it s part of our job description .

New: Find all your live TV in one place. If you are a Hulu with Live TV subscriber you ll see a lightning icon in your app s global navigation. From now on that will be the place you go if you want to see what s live. Playback will start immediately on your last watched channel. New: We learned from your feedback that if you are a Hulu with Live TV viewer you are always FOMOing. You want to know whether there s something better on TV right now and you think channels are the best way to find out what that is. So lo and behold the feature that is going to make this possible on Hulu: Live Guide. So what is it exactly Live Guide is a next generation experience that will help cord cutters traditional cable users and everyone in between find what to watch as quickly as possible. It s slick without any unnecessary details that would get in the way of your watching experience. How does it work Launch Live Guide anytime while watching live TV by holding your phone vertically or hitting the exit fullscreen icon which actually takes you into portrait player . Live Guide shows a list of all your recently watched channels. Scroll to the right on each of the channel rows to see what s coming up. By default the Live Guide shows your recently watched channels. But you can always select All Channels to see an A Z list of all channels. With just one click you ll be able to record any program playing now or in the future Yes it s a TV guide. But way better. When you re ready to watch tap your show choice and rotate your device horizontally to watch it full screen. New: So on this release we brought you Live Guide but we also redesigned the way you can look up on demand content. How do you get to it Select any episode of on demand show Turn your phone vertically to see the guide with the next episodes of that show content from My Stuff and recommended content. Turn it back horizontally to watch your program full screen. New: You were loud and clear on this one. You wanted better ways in which you could tell us what content you REALLY like and which one you could care less . We made it happen with these two new features: Remove from Watch History: Remove items that mistakenly ended up on your profile s Watch History whether you went to sleep with the TV on and woke up knee deep into a random season or your partner was too lazy to switch to their profile and binged like there was no tomorrow . To get rid of shows that you don t want to watch anymore select the Remove icon on the Keep Watching Collection. You can also check out all your watching history by scrolling to the bottom of the Keep Watching collection and selecting All Watch History. Then click on the three dots of every show that you want to remove from that hub. Stop suggesting this: You can now improve the quality of in app recommendations by down voting shows that don t apply to you. If you see suggestions in your lineup that you don t like tap on the Stop Suggesting button to make them go away forevah. Access this feature via the context menu on recommended collections Lineup News TV Movies and Kids on the Home screen. New: Hold your horses. We have ANOTHER update. And this is a big one for a lot of you. We brought back HDMI support! Use your iOS device to connect to an external display with an HDMI Lightning adapter. Apple approved Lightning to HDMI adapters highly recommended . New: And last but not least the Chromecast controller is now your remote of the future! It looks better feels better and does more for you.

Fix: Routine pest control. We killed some nasty bugs.

New: There s a new player in town! As always your feedback was on point and got us thinking of ways to polish our player and wash away your biggest pain points. Check out some of its new features and improvements: Hold your finger down anywhere on the screen to begin seeking which allows you to forward rewind the video with greater precision. Skip forward button will now fast forward the video by 30 seconds Tap screen quickly to fast forward the video in 30 seconds increments Tap once on the screen and select More Content to navigate to other Hulu content

New: You can now get to the content you love without even opening the Hulu app itself! What kind of sorcery is this Well it s our new Widget! It lets you resume videos you were already watching straight from your lock screen. Add our Widget with these simple steps: 1. Swipe right over the Home screen of your iPhone iPad Lock screen or while you re looking at your notifications 2. From there scroll to the bottom and tap Edit 3. Find Hulu in the list of More Widgets and tap 4. You should see the Hulu Widget at the bottom of your list. Pro tip: reorder them by touching holding and dragging them in the order that you want . 5. Access anytime by repeating step 1 Improvement: You would think that by now your iPad app SHOULD have learned that it belongs to you and you only. You ve been probably wishing it wouldn t ask you to select your profile every dang time you want to watch Hulu. But naw. It just kept asking. Good news is those days are over! We finally got to work on this issue and you can now set a default profile and MAKE your app remember you. Problem solved! However in case you DO share your iPad or your iPhone cause anything goes really you can still choose to have the profile select screen show up every time you launch our app. To each their own _ ツ _ Improvement: We re always on bug killing duty. It s a tough job but somebody s gotta do it.

New: Quick Actions are now a thing on our app. They allow you to perform useful app specific actions right from the Home screen. Use them on devices that support 3D Touch like iPhones 6s and above : 1. Find the Hulu app icon on your Home screen and apply pressure on it a lil bit more than you use for tap and hold 2. The screen will blur and you will see the shortcuts for Search and My Stuff 3. That s it! New: iPhone X pinch to zoom is here! Improvement: Hulu s UX team lives for things that look nice AND work nicely. So in their incessant quest for the perfect user experience they ve been at it again and made the Onboarding flow even better.

Some of you were launching our app and after the Hulu welcome screen came up you would be kicked out. The workaround was no fun since you had to delete and re install the app. We don t want you to waste your precious time and data so we implemented a quick fix. It should be good to go. Fill your brackets place your bets college basketball is here! And so is our new March Madness experience for Hulu with Live TV. You pick the teams you want to follow before the frenzy begins and then you ll know where and when they ll play and we ll record their games so you can watch later. What is basketball you say No worries! Just root for your favorite underdog mammal pick based on a geographic bias ask a Ouija board anything goes really. That s what makes March so dang mad. And that s Bracketology 101 kids.

If you are experiencing the crash on launch issue please try deleting and re installing the app. If this doesn t fix the issue please contact Hulu support at http: hulu.com help Our developers pulled all nighters and dined on Soylent for days straight just to fix the bugs that you called out. Good news is they didn t do it in vain. Our app looks and runs better. Take it for a spin.

All bugs are pests whether tiny or grotesque. We found small ones that made our app slow so obviously those had to go. There were BIG ones that messed up our show descriptions so we wrote them all mean letters of eviction. And there was one who crashed live playback who got smashed thanks to your awesome feedback!

Fix: We killed a bug that was graying out the option to turn on captions in on demand content. For obvious reasons fixing this was a top priority as soon as we learned about it. Fix: Routine pest control. We killed some other nasty bugs.

New: We re in the process of revamping our DVR. In the following months you ll see My Stuff and DVR transform into a more personalized experience. Thanks to this specific update you can now add content to MyStuff without necessarily recording it save that precious DVR space! . Also you ll see new recording options presented as a pop up modal. Decide between: Recording the whole series recording only new episodes or recording new episodes AND reruns. We are reducing your chances of missing your favorite shows by 80 . We just made that up but if we really did the math... the percentage would still be pretty high. One caveat: to access recording options for Sports and Leagues you will need to add your teams to MyStuff there s currently no auto record feature .

Bug fixes and UI improvements!

New: It s a fact that Hulu has tons of shows from a variety of content providers. It s also a fact that it can get complicated to keep track of what you can watch when you can watch and until when you can watch it. To set the right expectations for you our newest update includes a Latest Episodes badge for our on demand content. Whenever you see it you ll know that we have a limited number of episodes of that show. Hulu doesn t always have full series or full seasons available for all content. We know we know! But we hope this badge helps you plan accordingly and don t miss out on shows that have a shorter shelf life. New: Give your fingers a rest with Apple s Single sign on feature. You will now be able to login with your Hulu account by selecting Hulu as your Apple TV Provider across all Apple devices. After you have signed in the Hulu app will sign you in automatically from now on. Improvement: TV built around you should bring you right to the episode you want and not make you dig through spoilers. Thanks to this update when you go to the Episodes tab of a show you ll find the episode you left off at the top of the list. And if you are starting a show from the very beginning you ll be presented with an ordered list. Improvement: Take full advantage of what My Stuff offers. Whenever you roll over or click on the icon on a show s Details page you ll know what it will do thanks to an on screen message. So you ll either see: Add name of show to My Stuff to save for the future or Add name of show to My Stuff to keep track and record new episodes .
We improved our look and feel. Also we did some routine pest control: we squished some pesky bugs!
Slicker swiping smoother scrolling and smarter onboarding.
We ve made a number of tweaks and updates to make your TV experience a little smoother. Less time navigating Hulu means more time watching Hulu. Enjoy!

New: Picture in picture is back! Supported iPad users can keep browsing Hulu or even leave our app and continue watching your shows on this small but mighty new screen. New: Good things are coming. And in preparation for that you will see an opt in dialog to accept Hulu notifications. You won t be receiving them yet but when the time comes you ll be as excited as we are about them. Improvement: We brought back the feature to pause and resume playback with Apple supported headphones and Bluetooth accessories. We are sorry we took it off for a bit!

Our revamped badging system will help you identify content availability. For example New badges on both live and on demand shows will point you to the next best episode to watch whether this is airing right now or if it s something you missed and it s now on demand. There s so much to watch and sometimes not enough time. We want to give you as much info as possible with fewer clicks so you can make better choices. Now whenever you go to the context menu those three little dots on the corner of a video tile we are surfacing more details about the show game or movie.

Improvement: Fewer clicks more sports. When you search for a league and select its respective tile on the search results you will then go to the Games menu with a grid of all available and upcoming matches. Improvement: We keep making small changes that have big impacts on how you interact with Hulu. From perfecting our flip tray and error messaging to killing bugs and improving stability we believe they add up to a better experience. Enjoy!

We made some adjustments towards better readability and legibility. Squinting is no fun so we increased the weight of our font. Space is as important as words so we changed the leading padding and spacing. In certain scenarios the player would cause the app to crash during playback. We ve fixed that. We are now more stable! Chromecast wouldn t remember your Autoplay settings That s a thing of the past. Now it will.

We ve made some ch ch ch changes. Welcome to a new Hulu experience more personalized intuitive and customizable than ever before. Enjoy all your TV in one place. In this version of our app enjoy the following: New onboarding experience to help you build the Hulu you want right from the beginning. All new home that makes it easier to find the most timely and relevant things for you to watch right now. Track everything in My Stuff manage your shows movies networks and more. Watch and browse at the same time by using Fliptray. Just tap the Fliptray button during playback. If you have Hulu with Live TV you can record live TV to your Cloud DVR plus stream 50 top Live and On Demand TV channels. Sports fans can watch and record games! Upgrade options also include the ability to add Unlimited Screens and Enhanced Cloud DVR. You can also customize your service by adding SHOWTIME HBO and Cinemax. Visit the Hulu Help Center to learn more about the new Hulu experience and live TV
Bug fixes

Profiles Creating individual profiles enables you to keep track of all of your favorite shows and movies regardless of what other viewers in your household watch. Each profile created within the same Hulu account will have its own personalized Watchlist recommendations and viewing history allowing everyone to get the most out of their Hulu experience. You can also create profiles for your kids where they can watch kid friendly content without worrying about mature shows or movies being recommended to them. More info: https: help.hulu.com articles 53878582 Additional optimizations and improvements

New in 4.0.1: On popular demand we ve added access to the Queue from the navigation panel in addition to the heart icon on the action tray Other bug fixes and performance improvements including Chromecast Also fresh from 4.0.0: We ve redesigned the Hulu Plus app for iPhone from the ground up to create a focused and simple experience. And it is optimized for iOS8 and the new iPhone6 and iPhone 6 Plus. Here are the key features: Home Best content of the day on Hulu handpicked and curated by our expert editorial team Shows You Watch Swipe left form anywhere in the app for easy access to all the shows you are currently watching personalized to your viewing habits Navigation Swipe right from anywhere in the app to discover the entire breadth of the Hulu catalogue from TV Movies Kids Latino British and Hulu Originals Player Brand new player with cleaner controls and a nested menu for rich features like captions share and cast to TV Action Tray Scroll down on any page do expose the action tray at the top for quick access to search queue and cast to TV features from anywhere in the app Search Reimagined search with contextually grouped results by category. Access search from the action tray anywhere in the app Queue Access all your saved videos from the heart icon on the action tray available from anywhere in the app just a pull away Remote control stream and control your viewing experience on the big screen via Apple TV Chromecast Xbox1 PS3 and PS4 Share Share your favorite videos with your friends on Facebook Twitter text and email

Just a few extra optimizations and bug fixes. From version 3.0: We re excited to introduce you to an entirely new Hulu Plus experience for iPad. In addition to hundreds of internal optimizations the Hulu Plus app has been redesigned to make browsing more enjoyable than ever and help you discover new and exciting shows with ease. Some things to look out for: Minimize a video during playback by tapping the minimize icon or pinching the video. The video will continue playing at the bottom of the screen while you use the app to browse search or do anything else you can think of. Tap on an image of any episode show or season to take a peek at what s inside using the new discovery panel. Have fun casually exploring old episodes within a season or learning more about a new show with as little effort as possible. Want to get straight to watching content Just double tap any image . Check out collections of editorially curated shows clips and movies. We recommend starting with the Trending Now collection of the day s hottest clips it s a great way to see what everybody s talking about right now. Watch clips and short form content inline just one tap away. We ve made sure to keep all of your favorite features intact including the popular Kids Lock iPad only which limits the app to ad free safe and enjoyable content from our selection of Kids programming. Give it a try and let us know what you think at mobilesupport hulu.com.

Fixed a minor bug affecting Japan users. Also from our most recent version: Kids Lock iPad only . By enabling Kids Lock the Hulu Plus app will be limited to ad free safe and enjoyable content from our selection of Kids programming.

Introducing Kids Lock iPad only . By enabling Kids Lock the Hulu Plus app will be limited to ad free safe and enjoyable content from our selection of Kids programming. To enable this feature select the Kids tab and then the Kids Lock button. To disable this feature select the Unlock Kids button and enter your Hulu Plus password. Also includes access to Hulu s collection of video game trailers various fixes and stability improvements. Other changes from recent versions: Easy access to ad free Kids content Added support for on screen captions and subtitles in English and select other languages when available. You can now share your favorite shows and episodes with your friends on Facebook Twitter and via email. No more printing out long URLs and paying for paper and expensive postage fees. 10 second rewind in the player. Several performance and stability improvements.
